comment: He confuses himself a lot and has a hard time answering questions. His tests are confusing and his final was intense. Be prepared to spend weekends teaching yourself cos you're not learning a thing from him. Does random notebook checks in lab, online hwk, 2 tests and a final.Takes off points if u don't follow his "method" when showing work. avoid!

He does not curve, words tests awkwardly, NO extra credit, gets confused alot, when teaching he says something and then takes it back, hard to keep up with sometimes. READ the book, and be ready to do alot of studying on your own. 2 tests and a final, no make up for tests so if you miss a test he'll use the next test grade to replace it!Stay away!

Homework and labs are easy, but the tests are very hard.  When he goes over examples in class he will say one thing and then he will take it back and say something else which can be really confusing for students who are already having difficulty with the subject. Usually an A/B student, got my first C in this class.

he is by far one of the best professors ever. he is a very easy going teacher who grades fair. he goes over the material and is very helpful. he will go out of his way to try and explain the material to you. i highly recommend you to take him.

I thought he was great.I'm an A-B Bio/Chem student, enjoyed this class.Very organized lecturer.He gave practice tests that resembled the actaul tests.Also good, grade depended on much more than exams, so it was easy to boost grade.He is extremely nice and approachable.To those who failed..no comment.This is a tough one to mess up.Take him.

Horrible!! do yourself a favor stay away!!I guess when he was new he was easy.Now he confuses himself which confuses his students. Grading system was ok.I learned nothing from him.He showed us last semesters test and it was really easy.All they had to do was plug in numbers this semester he had stuff on the test that he didnt go over or give ex.

I just took him spring 2009.I am a str8 A student.He is a horrible teacher!!!He felt if two can make an A we all could.Even though most of us made a D or below.We had no retest or open book.the final was bogus people just walked out.He said we were better than the last semester and could handle the tough stuff. Ifthe whole class fails then ur good
decent teacher. not at all as HOT as psycho girl stated but he is really helpful. study the book and do the mastering physics and you'll be fine...

If you don't take this professor for any other reason, then take him because he is SO HOT!! I mean, FINE and a great dresser....he has the cutest smile EVER! His hotness definitely kept me coming to class and paying attention. Other than that, his class is great and he's an awesome prof. Truly cares and wants you to succeed. Oh yeah, he's HOT!!!!

Dr. Manigault is extremely helpful and really cares about his students passing the class.  He even gave the students a retest to improve our grades.  The exams are open book and really easy as long as you understand the homework.  However, you really need to read the text and search for examples in the book that look like the test question.

Great Prof. He cares a lot about his students. He wants you to do well in his class and he will try to help you get through. Open book tests, but it is a must to study. This guy is also an awesome swing dancer.fyi. Just work hard and enjoy the class because he is an enjoyable character.only bad thing that he is new to teaching and thats about it =)

Great Teacher. Is new so is still learning what works best for him. Is very helpful and wants to make sure everyone understands. His exams are open book, but you still have to study or you won't pass. Would recommend taking him if you can.

He's a new teacher so he's still trying to find out what teacher style works best for him. Tests are open book but thats useless if you don't study. As long as you do the example problems and practice problems, you should be good. He's extremely helpful on the tests so ask questions. Attendance not necessary. Labs are annoying though.

Mr. Mannigault is a GREAT professor. Like the comments below, the test are open-book and there are two test and a final. The mastering physics assignments online (to me) were easier than the test. I made an 91 on the first test and a 76 on the 2nd one. The lab is definitely an EASY A (just show up). I HIGHLY reccomend him. Dont pass him up!!!

Professor Manigault is a great professor. He explains the material very well and is available to help you if you need help. All of the tests are open book and he gives several grades to help balance out your overall average. Overall I would highly recommend him because he makes physics easy to understand. Also, he makes you laugh sometimes.

He tries really really hard and cares a lot about whether or not the majority of the class understands the material. Because of this.. tests are open book, extra credit is given... and he is really open to helping both during and after his office hours. Especially helpful before tests and before mastering physics assignments (hard) are due.
if u want to take him go head his exam are open book but if u dont study u wont know how to do the prob, only two exam and a final, but u can pass the class if you put some effort
